explanation: [0-0] A hand is pinching a small blue toy between its fingers, and a can of purple beverage is placed on a wooden table.

[0-3] The fingers then open and close, revealing a pair of small eyes on the toy. The hand is placed on the straw, and a knocking sound is heard from outside the door. Through the glass of the white door, a purple creature can be seen. There is a white cabinet in the background.

[3-10] The fingers then make a gesture, and the purple creature rushes in and shakes the hand frantically. Finally, the hand shakes on the wooden surface, the eyes of the toy turn into two crosses, the hand is covered in purple liquid, and the purple can rolls to the side of the hand.
